00001 /*

00031 void Query :: query (short * querySignal, long sampleRate, long numInputSamples, long timeFrame) {
00032     MFCC mfcc1;
00033     Filter fil1;
00034     QuickSort sort1;
00035     FILE *queryFp, *tab1Fp, *tab2Fp, *tab3Fp, *tab4Fp, *tab5Fp;
00036     double **mean, **queryData, distance, minDistance, **mfccData;
00037     double *frameString, *tempframeString, *coefficients, prevMatch, currMatch, rankValue;
00038     long N, K, D, n, k, d, i, j, c, RecordSize, *queryWinnerList, winnerID, queryWinnerID, dataPointID, iterations;
00039     long numWinnerDataPoints, *winnerDataPoints, maxFrameID, minRecordID, maxRecordID, startFrameID, endFrameID, numResults;
00040     char stringBuffer [_TAB1SONGIDSIZE+1];
00041     table1Record *winnerRecord, tempRecord;
00042     table5Record resultRecord, * recordList;
00043 
00044     // compute mfcc coefficients of query audio signal
00045     mfcc1.MFCCcompute(querySignal, sampleRate, numInputSamples, mfccData, _QUERYMFCCTEMPFILE, timeFrame);
00046     D = _CEPSTRALCOEFS;
00047 
00048     if (!(tab2Fp = fopen (_TABLE2NAME, "rb")))
00049     {
00050         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE2NAME);           // print error message
00051                 exit (0);
00052     }
00053 
00054     fseek (tab2Fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00055     RecordSize = _TAB2RECORDSIZE;
00056     K = ftell (tab2Fp) / RecordSize;
00057 
00058     // allocate space for K means with dimention D
00059     mean = (double **) calloc (K, sizeof (double *));
00060     for (k = 0; k < K; k ++)
00061         mean [k] = (double *) calloc (D, sizeof (double));
00062 
00063     fseek (tab2Fp, 0, SEEK_SET);
00064     for (k = 0; k < K; k ++)
00065         fread (mean [k], sizeof (real), D, tab2Fp);
00066 
00067     fclose (tab2Fp);
00068 
00069     if (!(queryFp = fopen (_QUERYMFCCTEMPFILE, "rb")))
00070     {
00071         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _QUERYMFCCTEMPFILE);            // print error message
00072                 exit (0);
00073     }
00074 
00075     fseek (queryFp, 0, SEEK_END);
00076     RecordSize = _TAB2RECORDSIZE;
00077     N = ftell (queryFp) / RecordSize;
00078 
00079     // allocate space for N data points with dimention D
00080     queryData = (double **) calloc (N, sizeof (double *));
00081     for (n = 0; n < N; n ++)
00082         queryData [n] = (double *) calloc (D, sizeof (double));
00083 
00084     fseek (queryFp, 0, SEEK_SET);
00085     for (n = 0; n < N; n ++)
00086         fread (queryData [n], sizeof (real), D, queryFp);
00087 
00088     fclose (queryFp);
00089 
00090     queryWinnerList = (long *) calloc (N, sizeof (long));
00091 
00092     // select winners for each data point
00093     for (n = 0; n < N; n ++)
00094     {
00095         for (k = 0; k < K; k ++)
00096         {
00097             distance = 0.0;
00098             for (d = 0; d < D; d ++)
00099             {
00100                 distance += (queryData [n][d] - mean [k][d]) * (queryData [n][d] - mean [k][d]);
00101             }
00102 
00103             // Euclidean distance between nth data point and kth mean
00104             distance = sqrt (distance);
00105             if (k == 0 || distance < minDistance)
00106             {
00107                 minDistance = distance;
00108                 // index of the winner mean
00109                 winnerID = k;
00110             }
00111         }
00112 
00113         queryWinnerList [n] = winnerID;
00114     }
00115 
00116     sort1.quickSort (queryWinnerList, N);
00117 
00118     if (!(tab3Fp = fopen (_TABLE3NAME, "rb")))
00119     {
00120         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE3NAME);           // print error message
00121                 exit (0);
00122     }
00123 
00124     if (!(tab4Fp = fopen (_TABLE4NAME, "wb")))
00125     {
00126         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE4NAME);           // print error message
00127                 exit (0);
00128     }
00129 
00130     n = 0;
00131     queryWinnerID = queryWinnerList [0];
00132     fread (&winnerID, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00133     fread (&dataPointID, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00134 
00135     while (1)
00136     {
00137         if (winnerID < queryWinnerID)
00138         {
00139             fread (&winnerID, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00140             fread (&dataPointID, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00141             continue;
00142         }
00143         else if (winnerID == queryWinnerID)
00144         {
00145             fwrite (&dataPointID, sizeof (long), 1, tab4Fp);
00146             fread (&winnerID, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00147             fread (&dataPointID, sizeof (long), 1, tab3Fp);
00148             continue;
00149         }
00150         else if (winnerID > queryWinnerID)
00151         {
00152             n ++;
00153             queryWinnerID = queryWinnerList [n];
00154         }
00155 
00156         if (n >= N || feof (tab3Fp))
00157             break;
00158 
00159     }
00160 
00161     fclose (tab3Fp);
00162     fclose (tab4Fp);
00163 
00164     if (!(tab4Fp = fopen (_TABLE4NAME, "rb")))
00165     {
00166         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE4NAME);           // print error message
00167                 exit (0);
00168     }
00169 
00170     fseek (tab4Fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00171     numWinnerDataPoints = ftell (tab4Fp) / sizeof (long);
00172     winnerDataPoints = (long *) calloc (numWinnerDataPoints, sizeof (long));
00173 
00174     fseek (tab4Fp, 0, SEEK_SET);
00175     fread (winnerDataPoints, sizeof (long), numWinnerDataPoints, tab4Fp);
00176 
00177     sort1.quickSort (winnerDataPoints, numWinnerDataPoints);
00178 
00179     fclose (tab4Fp);
00180 
00181     if (!(tab1Fp = fopen (_TABLE1NAME, "rb")))
00182     {
00183         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE1NAME);           // print error message
00184                 exit (0);
00185     }
00186 
00187     RecordSize = _TAB1RECORDSIZE;
00188 
00189     winnerRecord = (table1Record *) calloc (numWinnerDataPoints, sizeof (table1Record));
00190     for (i = 0; i < numWinnerDataPoints; i ++)
00191     {
00192         fseek (tab1Fp, winnerDataPoints [i] * RecordSize, SEEK_SET);
00193         fread (winnerRecord [i].dataPoint, sizeof (real), _CEPSTRALCOEFS, tab1Fp);
00194         fread (winnerRecord [i].songID, sizeof (char), _TAB1SONGIDSIZE, tab1Fp);
00195         fread (&winnerRecord [i].frameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab1Fp);
00196     }
00197 
00198     coefficients = (double *) calloc (_FILTERORDER * 2 + 1, sizeof (double));
00199     for (j = -_FILTERORDER; j <= _FILTERORDER; j ++)
00200     {
00201         coefficients [j + _FILTERORDER] = 1.0 / ((double)_FILTERORDER * 2.0 + 1.0);
00202     }
00203 
00204     i = 0;
00205     tempRecord = winnerRecord [i];
00206     minRecordID = i;
00207     
00208     if (!(tab5Fp = fopen (_TABLE5NAME, "wb")))
00209     {
00210         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE5NAME);           // print error message
00211                 exit (0);
00212     }
00213 
00214     while (1)
00215     {
00216         if (i == numWinnerDataPoints || memcmp (tempRecord.songID, winnerRecord [i].songID, _TAB1SONGIDSIZE) != 0)
00217         {
00218             maxFrameID = winnerRecord [i - 1].frameID;
00219             if (frameString != NULL)
00220                 free (frameString);
00221             if (tempframeString != NULL)
00222                 free (tempframeString);
00223             frameString = (double *) calloc (maxFrameID + 1, sizeof (double));
00224             tempframeString = (double *) calloc (maxFrameID + 1, sizeof (double));
00225             maxRecordID = i;
00226             for (j = 0; j <= maxFrameID; j ++)
00227             {
00228                  frameString [j] = 0.0;
00229             }
00230             for (j = minRecordID; j < maxRecordID; j ++)
00231                 frameString [winnerRecord [j].frameID] = 1.0;
00232 
00233             // do processing on the bit string ... apply
00234             memcpy (tempframeString, frameString, (maxFrameID + 1) * sizeof (double));
00235             fil1.myfilter (coefficients, _FILTERORDER, frameString, maxFrameID);
00236             for (j = 0; j <= maxFrameID; j ++)
00237             {
00238                 if (frameString [j] >= 0.5)
00239                     frameString [j] = 1.0;
00240                 else
00241                     frameString [j] = 0.0;
00242             }
00243 
00244             // find matching frame sequences
00245             prevMatch = 0.0;
00246             for (j = 0; j <= maxFrameID; j++)
00247             {
00248                 currMatch = frameString [j];
00249                 if (prevMatch == 0.0 && currMatch == 1.0)
00250                 {
00251                     startFrameID = j;
00252                     prevMatch = currMatch;
00253                 }
00254                 if (prevMatch == 1.0 && currMatch == 0.0)
00255                 {
00256                     endFrameID = j;
00257                     prevMatch = currMatch;
00258                     rankValue = 0.0;
00259                     for (c = startFrameID; c < endFrameID; c++)
00260                     {
00261                         if (frameString [c] != tempframeString [c])
00262                             rankValue += 1.0;
00263                     }
00264                     rankValue /= (double)(endFrameID - startFrameID);
00265                     if ((endFrameID - startFrameID) > N / 2)
00266                     {
00267                         resultRecord.rank = (long)(100.0 * rankValue);
00268                         resultRecord.startFrameID = startFrameID;
00269                         resultRecord.endFrameID = endFrameID;
00270                         memcpy (resultRecord.songID, tempRecord.songID, _TAB1SONGIDSIZE);
00271                         fwrite (&resultRecord.rank, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00272                         fwrite (resultRecord.songID, sizeof (char), _TAB1SONGIDSIZE, tab5Fp);
00273                         fwrite (&resultRecord.startFrameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00274                         fwrite (&resultRecord.endFrameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00275                     }
00276                 }
00277             }
00278 
00279             tempRecord = winnerRecord [i];
00280             minRecordID = i;
00281         }
00282         i ++;
00283         if (i > numWinnerDataPoints)
00284             break;
00285     }
00286 
00287     fclose (tab5Fp);
00288     fclose (tab1Fp);
00289 
00290     if (!(tab5Fp = fopen (_TABLE5NAME, "rb")))
00291     {
00292         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE5NAME);           // print error message
00293                 exit (0);
00294     }
00295 
00296     long * rankList;
00297 
00298     fseek (tab5Fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00299     RecordSize = _TAB5RECORDSIZE;
00300     numResults = ftell (tab5Fp) / RecordSize;
00301     fseek (tab5Fp, 0, SEEK_SET);
00302 
00303     recordList = (table5Record *) calloc (numResults, sizeof (table5Record));
00304     rankList = (long *) calloc (numResults, sizeof (long));
00305     for (i = 0; i < numResults; i ++)
00306     {
00307         fread (&recordList[i].rank, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00308         fread (recordList[i].songID, sizeof (char), _TAB1SONGIDSIZE, tab5Fp);
00309         fread (&recordList[i].startFrameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00310         fread (&recordList[i].endFrameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00311     }
00312 
00313     for (i = 0; i < numResults; i ++)
00314     {
00315         for (j = 0; j < numResults - 1; j ++)
00316         {
00317             if (recordList[j].rank > recordList[j + 1].rank)
00318             {
00319                 memcpy (&resultRecord, &recordList[j], sizeof (table5Record));
00320                 memcpy (&recordList[j], &recordList[j + 1], sizeof (table5Record));
00321                 memcpy (&recordList[j + 1], &resultRecord, sizeof (table5Record));
00322             }
00323         }
00324     }
00325 
00326     fclose (tab5Fp);
00327 
00328     if (!(tab5Fp = fopen (_TABLE5NAME, "wb")))
00329     {
00330         printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _TABLE5NAME);           // print error message
00331                 exit (0);
00332     }
00333 
00334     // output needs to be modified as per the requirement of the interface
00335     printf ("Rank Normalized Hamming Distance Match Length (sec) SongID     start position (sec)   end position (sec)\n");
00336     for (i = 0; i < numResults; i ++)
00337     {
00338         fread (&recordList[i].rank, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00339         fread (recordList[i].songID, sizeof (char), _TAB1SONGIDSIZE, tab5Fp);
00340         fread (&recordList[i].startFrameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00341         fread (&recordList[i].endFrameID, sizeof (long), 1, tab5Fp);
00342 
00343         strncpy (stringBuffer, recordList[i].songID, _TAB1SONGIDSIZE);
00344         stringBuffer [_TAB1SONGIDSIZE] = '\0';
00345         printf ("%4d %27d %18d %s %20d %18d\n", i,  recordList[i].rank, (recordList[i].endFrameID - recordList[i].startFrameID) / (1000 / timeFrame), stringBuffer, recordList[i].startFrameID / (1000 / timeFrame), recordList[i].endFrameID / (1000 / timeFrame));
00346     }
00347 
00348     fclose (tab5Fp);
00349 }
